name: Rutowari
description:
Place and cultivate roots for their growth/blooming and conquer the planet’s ecosystem and take it to your home planet as a prize in this multiplayer competitive arcade game of intergalactic cyber-botanics!+

PLAYER 1: Use the [arrow keys] to move, [z] to jump and [x] to grab. Release [x] while not moving to drop what you're holding onto the ground, release it while pressing down to plant a seed [down + x], or release it while pressing any direction to aim a throw [left/right + x].

PLAYER 2: Use your controler's [D-pad] or [analog stick] to move/aim. Press the [bottom face button] to jump and the [right face button] to perform a grab. Combine directional inputs with the release of your grab to drop, throw and plant the seeds.

+ 2 PATHS TO VICTORY

- TAKE CONTROL THROUGH THE LITHOSPHERE!+

Hijack the planet’s core with the deep roots of your tree

Plant this seed in a wet ground and it will grow into a mother-tree!+

If the roots reach the bottom of the screen, you’ve made it to the planet’s mainframe!+

It will grow faster if you continue watering it!+

- RULE OVER THE ATMOSPHERE!+

Monopolize gas trade relations with a superpopulation of vegetable roots

Plant this seed in wet ground and it will grow into a flying sprout!

Plant enough of them and you have a monopoly on the photosynthetic energy resources!+

It will bloom in no time, as long as you give it some water!+

A game by: @adammosouza + @elektrikid + @idknov + @bakematto + @queroumchazin + @vitimzim
Programming and Impplementation: @adammosouza
Visual Development: @idknov + @bakematto + @elektrikid
Music and Sound FX: @queroumchazin + @vitimzim
